docs.title: Overview
docs.text:
Metachest is publicly available dataset patology classification on chest radiographs generated from ChestX-ray14, CheXpert, MIMIC-CXR-JPG and PadChest datasets.

A detailed explanation of the collection procedure and statistics can be found in the paper MetaChest: Generalized few-shot learning of patologies from chest X-rays.

docs.title: Data
docs.text: The code to generate the dataset is available at its repository.
